remarks: Define the function which gives the set of ring isomorphisms between two given rings.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 16-Jun-2011.)
statement:
df-rngoiso $p |- RngIso = ( r e. RingOps , s e. RingOps |-> { f e. ( r RngHom s ) | f : ran ( 1st ` r ) -1-1-onto-> ran ( 1st ` s ) } ) $.
$d f r s $.
